description: This file defines the controller functions for the 'products' module in an Express.js application, handling CRUD operations for products by invoking corresponding service methods and returning HTTP responses.

methods.name: export async function list(req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction) { list
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to list all products, invokes the service to retrieve products, and responds with a JSON array of products.

methods.name: export async function get(req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction) { get
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to retrieve a specific product by ID, invoking the service and returning the product data.

methods.name: export async function create(req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction) { create
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST requests to create a new product, invoking the service with request body data, and returning the created product.

methods.name: export async function update(req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction) { update
methods.description: Handles HTTP PUT requests to update an existing product by ID, invoking the service, and returning the updated product.

methods.name: export async function remove(req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction) { remove
methods.description: Handles HTTP DELETE requests to remove a product by ID, invoking the service, and sending a no-content response.
